bugs.summary: Minor parsing cleanups.
Support "auto | <ratio>" syntax for aspect-ratio
Enable :is() / :where() on all release channels.
Support 'field_bound' field attribute for the custom derive parse
::first-letter/::first-line pseudo selector does not support opacity
Crash in [@ RtlAcquireSRWLockExclusive | mozilla::TaskQueue::BeginShutdown]
CanvasEventRingBuffer::ReadNextEvent can loop if ReadElement fails after checkpoint.
Crash in [@ memcpy_repmovs | mozilla::layers::CanvasEventRingBuffer::ReturnWrite]
Crash in [@ mozilla::layers::CanvasTranslator::CreateDrawTarget]
Crash in [@ mozilla::layers::CanvasChild::ShouldBeCleanedUp]
Animations / transitions of opacity and visibility together are incorrectly throttled.
Make CallbackObject methods return JSObject pointers rather than handles
Lots of time spend in Window.clearTimeout after watching movies on https://www.tvnow.de
Create ReplaceTextTransaction to avoid creating both InsertTextTransaction and DeleteTextTransaction
Fall back to HTTPS in URL fixup (including location bar) (like for hosts that refuse a connection on port 80 via HTTP, but accepts connections via HTTPS on port 443)
Beacon should not be restricted by CORS
A lot of "IInputPane2::TryHide is failure" warnings
Disallow duplicate PMIs when creating request
Position of radio button and required attribute not reported
DrawTargetD2D1::OptimizeSourceSurface should support RGBX/RGBA
Fix YCbCrTextureClientAllocationHelper::IsCompatible()
memory report mozilla::gfx::NativeFontResourceMac::Create
Missing glyphs in font from pdf2htmlex converter in Mac OS 10.15
Crash in [@ core::option::expect_failed | webrender::spatial_tree::SpatialTree::get_relative_transform]
Blurred SVG - Background-image regression after 75.0b9
Picture caching doesn't work on gmail
GL errors running dom/media/mediasession/test/test_active_mediasession_within_page.html on android webrender
Sanitize fonts before we use them
Assertion failure: is_uint24(cp_offset + eats_at_least), at new-regexp/regexp-bytecode-generator.cc:183
More cleanups of NaN in JS::Value
Optimize Math.floor in CacheIR and Warp
Warp: Transpile JSOp::New
Replace JS_DIAGNOSTICS_ASSERT with MOZ_DIAGNOSTIC_ASSERT?
Perma SM(cgc) line Assertion failure: source->hasUncompressedSource(), at /builds/worker/workspace/build/src/js/src/vm/JSScript.cpp:2625 even for successful tasks
Fix failing 'multi-value' spec-tests
Remove bottom-type and align validation of ref.func again
Fix baseline compilation of fac-ssa
abspos root element (html) ignores top/right/bottom/left properties, if it has "display:flex" or "display:grid"
Crash in [@ gfxFontEntry::HasCharacter]
avoid name hiding for handling multipart channel in HttpChannelChild
nsJARChannel::asyncOpen can still block
Local macOS run of APZ mochitests hangs
clicking on scrollbar track after pinch zoom on scroll frame without overflow scrolls too far
We want a telemetry for optimizing content process creation for typical sites.
Enable browser_permmgr_sync.js with Fission
Isolate network cache per first-party when privacy.partition.network_state is set to true
Isolate image cache per first-party when privacy.partition.network_state is set to true
Upgrade Firefox 78 to use NSS 3.53
Audit whether we need mPrefersReducedMotionCached or not in these days
Right click opens context menu on wrong monitor or virtual desktop (mac OS Catalina)
Flashing of new windows is annoying during session restore
Do not call walker's highlight accessible directly, instead move this into accessibility-proxy.

Vertical scrollbar not available anymore in Firefox Nightly for Network/JSON content
Add ability to recall previous search terms and history to Address Bar
Disabling browser.urlbar.richSuggestions.tail should hide all tail suggestions
Design and implement an Enterprise Policy to control Picture-in-Picture
Opening PDF in system default always opens in new tab
Enable setting Firefox as default PDF reader on Windows
Remove registration for FTP support on Windows
Support GetStarted and Import Screens UI theme in multistage about:welcome
Checkbox in What’s New panel is cut out on macOS in French
fix tables in Markdown documentation
Spocs from cache load optimization
The non-scrolling sidebar in about:addons and about:preferences is a potential migraine trigger
Enable browser_privatebrowsing_about.js on Fission and test-verify
[meta] [Fission] Update protectionsUI tests for Fission
Report server_error on HTTP 5XX when polling for changes
Implement allow overriding specific search engines according to an allowlist
`trackRemainingChanges` is a method on the engine, not the store

Make library window black when using preinstalled Dark Theme
update IRC reference in mach bootstrap output
checking whether removing dead symbols breaks debugging... .../mozilla/old-configure: 1: -m: not found

Add hack to bootstrap to install Python 2 on macOS
Move old-configure options to python configure, part 1
